data.title: Jonah Hill: Acting Was An 'Amazing Derailment' On The Path To Directing
data.meta_description: Hill always wanted to be a writer and director, but an unexpected compliment in an acting class shifted him toward performing instead. Now he's written and directed his first movie, Mid90s.
